meanings.sent1: The commutativity of addition allows us to switch the order of numbers without changing the result.
meanings.sent2: Mathematicians study the commutativity of various operations to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The commutativity of multiplication made the math problem a breeze to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her flexibility in scheduling demonstrated the commutativity of her plans.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the commutativity of subtraction can simplify complex equations.

meanings.definition: The property of a mathematical operation that does not depend on the order of the operands.
meanings.sent1: Teachers explain the commutativity of division by showing how the order of numbers doesn't matter.
meanings.sent2: Students learn about the commutativity of operations like addition and multiplication in elementary school.
meanings.sent3: The commutativity of subtraction in this puzzle game adds an interesting twist to the challenge.
meanings.sent4: The commutativity of logic in programming languages ensures efficient execution of code.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the commutativity of functions is crucial in advanced mathematics courses.
